Articles.Content:
To land on the Mun using ONLY SRB's as thrusters?

Probably not?
Yes it's possible but not easy. Since you can't throttle srbs you have to time it right or maybe use throttle control in the vab to do it.

> 
> What about without RCS thrusters?

A Mun mission without RCS? Are you n... Oh wait, you said **without** RCS. Of course you can go to Mun without RCS! How on earth would you get the idea you could not?
Don't have the link but way back in the day, scot manly went Munn landing->Minmus landing->return to Kerbin all with the small srb's and before tweakables
You could probably use the small SRBs to tweak your landing. Considering the suspension on the landing legs, you wouldn't need to decelerate too much.

i remember that video. i saw it a while ago.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-23T20:09:02Z" title="03/23/2015 08:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 23, 2015</time> by jman508**
  
to edit or not to edit

Here is the video in question
